// WARN: This file is auto generated by flood-tide-gen
match CmdOp::from(nv.opt.num) {
    CmdOp::Radix => {
        conf.opt_radix = value_to_radix_style(nv)?;
    }
    CmdOp::NoEscape => {
        conf.flg_no_escape = true;
    }
    CmdOp::SrcFile => {
        conf.flg_src_file = true;
    }
    CmdOp::Help => {
        conf.flg_help = true;
    }
    CmdOp::Version => {
        conf.flg_version = true;
    }
}
